Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Proficient (shows most elements clearly and correctly)
CAN: The student can draw two students holding cups connected by a string, illustrating the concept of a string telephone.
The student can show sound waves or lines representing sound traveling through the string from one cup to the other.
The student can depict basic materials used in the construction, such as cups and string, with reasonable accuracy.
The student can include a label or small description indicating how the string helps transmit sound, showing understanding of communication.
CANNOT: The student may not always accurately show the tightness of the string (may occasionally depict string as too loose or slack, which could misunderstand its role in effective communication).

The student might not fully articulate how simple devices like string telephones solve the problem of distance communication (e.g., lacks explicit labels or detailed explanation beyond basic depiction).
